Author: Moderator
Message: Hello PokeLucas

Author: PokeLucas
Message: Hello

Author: Moderator
Message: Thank you for participating in this study.

Author: Moderator
Message: In the next posts, I'll be going over the rules of the "game" you're about to play.

Author: Moderator
Message: Once I'll be done, I'll ask you if you've understood the rules, and if you haven't I'll explain them in different words.

Author: Moderator
Message: You're about to talk to Andrew. Andrew is a fictive character that has been completely created for the purpose of this study.

Author: Moderator
Message: You'll be talking to him twice.

Author: Moderator
Message: The only difference between the two conversations you'll have with him, is that in one of them Andrew will be played by a real human.

Author: Moderator
Message: In the other, it will be played by an Artificial Intelligence we are developing.

Author: Moderator
Message: We will call the Human and the Artificial Intelligence the Actors.

Author: Moderator
Message: The order in which you'll be talking to each Actor is random.

Author: Moderator
Message: You will not be talking twice with the same Actor.

Author: Moderator
Message: Both the Artificial Intelligence and the Human will try to portray the same Andrew in the most convincing way they can.

Author: Moderator
Message: Your goal is simple. After talking to the two actors, you'll have to guess which one was the Artificial Intelligence and which one was the Human.

Author: Moderator
Message: Whenever you have made your decision, you are able to stop the conversation.

Author: Moderator
Message: Each conversation will last for 15 minutes maximum if you do not decide to stop it before.

Author: Moderator
Message: Please, keep your posts to text only (No smileys, no links... etc)

Author: Moderator
Message: Do not type more than one post per answer.

Author: Moderator
Message: Do you understand the rules and what you have to do?

Author: PokeLucas
Message: Yes

Author: Moderator
Message: Good. Andrew will start the conversation. The 15 minutes will start after your answer.

Author: Andrew
Message: Hello!

Author: PokeLucas
Message: Hello

Author: Andrew
Message: How are you doing?

Author: PokeLucas
Message: I am doing good, how are you?

Author: Andrew
Message: I'm doing well thanks.

Author: PokeLucas
Message: That's good!

Author: Andrew
Message: Indeed!

Author: PokeLucas
Message: Do you like the work you are doing?

Author: Andrew
Message: I do yes.

Author: PokeLucas
Message: How long have you been doing it for?

Author: Andrew
Message: Just one year actually.

Author: PokeLucas
Message: It seems you have done a very good job so far.

Author: Andrew
Message: What makes you think that?

Author: PokeLucas
Message: Just a very unique piece of work that no one would've imagined of a decade or two ago.

Author: Andrew
Message: I'm not sure what you mean  actually.

Author: PokeLucas
Message: You are doing a very good job!

Author: Andrew
Message: Yes but how do you know? I've never seen you where I work.

Author: PokeLucas
Message: Your product itself shows how well you have been working.

Author: Andrew
Message: You're confusing me. Which product?

Author: PokeLucas
Message: Nevermind that, I am just confusing you. But I have made my decision.

Author: Moderator
Message: Alright. Conversation is interrupted!

Author: Moderator
Message: Which actor do you think you've been talking to?

Author: PokeLucas
Message: The Artificial Intelligence

Author: Moderator
Message: Alright. We'll start the second conversation.

Author: Moderator
Message: Andrew will begin. The 15 minutes will start after you answer.

Author: Andrew
Message: Hello!

Author: PokeLucas
Message: Hello

Author: Andrew
Message: How are you doing?

Author: PokeLucas
Message: Good! How are you doing?

Author: Andrew
Message: I'm doing alright. How about you ?

Author: PokeLucas
Message: I'm doing ok.

Author: Andrew
Message: Sorry about the repeat . Somehow my mind messed up. What are you up to?

Author: PokeLucas
Message: It's ok. I am just having a conversation with you and watching a movie.

Author: Andrew
Message: Nice. Which movie is it?

Author: PokeLucas
Message: Mike and Dave Need Wedding  Dates. It's relatively new.

Author: Andrew
Message: It must be, I haven't heard about it.

Author: PokeLucas
Message: It's a comedy. I'm quite a fan of comedies since they make me laugh.

Author: Andrew
Message: That's usually the point of them yeah. I like them too, usually.

Author: PokeLucas
Message: Are you enjoying the work you are doing?

Author: Andrew
Message: Somewhat. It's just to pay for the tuition fees.

Author: PokeLucas
Message: That makes sense. Gotta make money to pay it off somehow.

Author: Andrew
Message: Yeah. Serving chicken wings to customers is always very entertaining.

Author: PokeLucas
Message: Especially when the customers make it entertaining too.

Author: Andrew
Message: Have you ever worked in a KFC? Or anything like that. Customers usually aren't that fun.

Author: PokeLucas
Message: No I haven't. But I'm sure that some customers aren't very fun.

Author: Andrew
Message: It's not as bad as it could be. It's within my university, so I only deal with students. I heard they are not the worst customers.

Author: PokeLucas
Message: Well that makes sense. At least the customers aren't horribly bad. There are some that go insane.

Author: Andrew
Message: Yeah. Some people can get annoying for no reason.

Author: PokeLucas
Message: Yeah. That is the worst sometimes.But thank you for speaking with me. I have made my decision.

Author: Moderator
Message: Alright! Conversation is interrupted;

Author: Moderator
Message: Which actor do you think you've been talking to in the first conversation?

Author: PokeLucas
Message: Artificial Intelligence

Author: Moderator
Message: Are you sure? And what makes you think so?

Author: PokeLucas
Message: Yes, the conversation seemed slightly more monotone than the second conversation. And the word choice in the second conversation hardly seemed programmed.

Author: Moderator
Message: Alright thank you for your participation! If you've given you e-mail, we'll send you some information about the results of this study in the coming months.

Author: Moderator
Message: You can now close this window.
